// vxlmono
		   // Font Size: 7x6px
		   // offset = ascii_code(character) - ascii_code(' ')
		   // data = vxlmono[lut[offset]]

const ivec2 font_size = ivec2(7, 6);

#define space 32        // ' '

void draw_character(inout float text_out, in vec2 location, in vec2 uv, int character)
{
    int base = character - 32;
    
    ivec2 diff = ivec2(floor(uv * iResolution.xy - location * iResolution.xy));
    
    if ( all(greaterThanEqual(diff, ivec2(0))) && all(lessThan(diff, font_size)) ) {
        ivec2 offset = clamp(diff, ivec2(0), font_size - 1);
        text_out += float(bool( (data[lut[base] + ((font_size.y - 1) - offset.y)] & (1 << offset.x)) ));   
    }
}

#define draw_string(text_out, location, uv, characters) for (int i = 0 ; i < characters.length() ; ++i) { draw_character(text_out, (location * iResolution.xy + vec2(i * (font_size.x), 0)) / iResolution.xy, uv, characters[i]); }

void draw_number(inout float text_out, in vec2 location, in vec2 uv, float number)
{
    uint ipart = uint(floor(abs(number)));
    
    // only care about integer part
    
    uint i = 0u;
    while(0u != ipart) {
        uint ivalue = (ipart % 10u);
        ipart = ipart / 10u;
        
        draw_character(text_out, (location * iResolution.xy - vec2(i * uint(font_size.x), 0)) / iResolution.xy, uv, int(uint(zero) + ivalue));
        ++i;
    }
}

//THETA is the golden angle in radians: 2 * PI * ( 1 - 1 / PHI )
#define THETA 2.399963229728653 

vec2 spiralPosition(float i, float n, float f, float t)
{
    float angle = (i + t * 18.75f) * THETA; 
    float radius = ( (i * mix(1000000.0, 10000000.0, t)) / n ) + f;
    return vec2( radius * cos( angle ), radius * sin( angle ) );
}

void mainImage(out vec4 fragColor, in vec2 fragCoord)
{
    vec2 uv = ( fragCoord - .5 * iResolution.xy ) / iResolution.y;
    
    vec3 d = vec3(1000.);
    float t = iTime + 50.0f;
    float t0 = floor(t);
    float t1 = floor(t + 1.0);
    float tf = fract(t);
    
    // honed in on the count singularity (count too high, spiral begin to expand rather than contract)
    const float wave = 0.5f;
    const float offset = 16.2634;
    float within0 = (fract(t0 * 18.75) * 2.0f - 1.0f) * wave;
    float within1 = (fract(t1 * 18.75) * 2.0f - 1.0f) * wave;
    
    int cnt0 = 8192 * (100000 + int((offset + within0) * 10000.0f));
    int cnt1 = 8192 * (100000 + int((offset + within1) * 10000.0f));
    
    for(int i = 0; i < 100; i++)
    {
        vec2 p0 = uv - spiralPosition( float(i), float(cnt0), within0, t0 );
        
        vec2 p1 = uv - spiralPosition( float(i), float(cnt1), within1, t1 );
        
        vec2 pn = mix(p0, p1, tf);
        
        d.x = min( dot( p0, p0 ), d.x );
        d.y = min( dot( p1, p1 ), d.y );
        d.z = min( dot( pn, pn ), d.z );
    }
    
    d = 0.007-sqrt(d);
    
    vec3 hw = 0.5f * fwidth(d);
    d = smoothstep(-hw, hw, d);
    
    float channel = d.x * (1.0f - tf) * 0.15f + d.y * tf * 0.05f + d.z * tf;
    
    uv = fragCoord.xy/iResolution.xy;
    vec4 h = textureLod(iChannel0, uv, 0.0f);
    
    h = vec4(channel, h.x + h.y * 0.75f, h.y + h.z * 0.5f, h.z + h.w * 0.5f);
    
    const float sz = 0.25f;
    float text = 0.0f;
    
    draw_string(text, vec2(0.0f, 0.0f) * sz, uv * sz, int[](hi_T, hi_I, hi_M, hi_E, lo_p, lo_a, lo_t, lo_h));
    h += text;
    
    fragColor = h;
}
renderpass.name: Buffer A
